snippet: Pittsburgh Steelers' linebacker James Harrison doesn't want to face a suspension. He is also not interested in talking to NFL representatives, either....
lead_paragraph: Pittsburgh Steelers' linebacker James Harrison doesn't want to face a suspension. He is also not interested in talking to NFL representatives, either.

headline.main: Steelers' LB James Harrison Not Interested in Talking to NFL
headline.print_headline: Steelers' LB James Harrison Not Interested in Talking to NFL
